title: Three easy dips for kids
description: Dips are great for sandwich fillings or lunch boxes, or make the combo for picnics and parties. Serve with vegetable sticks, baked potatoes, potato skins, pitta breads or flatbreads. These will keep in the fridge for two days.
ingredients: 1 x 400g tin chickpeas, butter beans, pinto or borlotti beans (no added salt), rinsed and drained
1 tsp lemon juice, plus extra, to taste
150ml/5fl oz plain yoghurt (or a dairy-free alternative)
small bunch fresh herbs such as mint, coriander or parsley (optional)
1-2 spring onions, chopped finely with scissors
½ mango, peel removed by an adult, chopped
handful of sweetcorn (fresh, tinned or frozen and defrosted)
small bunch herbs, such as mint, coriander or parsley, chopped (optional)
